member.name: T:CSHARP.Diagnostics.ConsoleLog
member.summary: Console Event Log Handler

member.name: P:CSHARP.Diagnostics.ConsoleLog.ConnectionString
member.summary: Connection string used to write to log

member.name: P:CSHARP.Diagnostics.ConsoleLog.Parameters
member.summary: Additional parameters used to write to log

member.name: P:CSHARP.Diagnostics.ConsoleLog.VerboseLevel
member.summary: Levels to log (0 = all, 1 to 10 level of verbosity)

member.name: M:CSHARP.Diagnostics.ConsoleLog.LogEvent(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Writes event message to log
member.remarks: V1.0.0.1 Added end of line marker for console error messages if error message does not end in end of line marker.

member.name: M:CSHARP.Diagnostics.ConsoleLog.FlushEventLog
member.summary: Flushing event log to console does nothing

member.summary: File System Event Log Handler

member.summary: Connection string used to write to log

member.summary: Additional parameters used to write to log

member.summary: Levels to log (0 = all, 1 to 10 level of verbosity)

member.name: M:CSHARP.Diagnostics.FileSystemLog.LogEvent(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Writes event message to log

member.name: M:CSHARP.Diagnostics.FileSystemLog.FlushEventLog
member.summary: Flushing event log for file does nothing

member.name: T:CSHARP.Diagnostics.IEventLog
member.summary: Interface that supports writing log messages

member.name: P:CSHARP.Diagnostics.IEventLog.ConnectionString
member.summary: Connection string used to write to log

member.name: P:CSHARP.Diagnostics.IEventLog.Parameters
member.summary: Additional parameters used to write to log

member.name: P:CSHARP.Diagnostics.IEventLog.VerboseLevel
member.summary: Gets level of verbosity to log (0 to 10)

member.name: M:CSHARP.Diagnostics.IEventLog.LogEvent(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Writes event message to log
member.param: 0 = all, 1 to 10 increased level of verbosity

member.name: M:CSHARP.Diagnostics.IEventLog.FlushEventLog
member.summary: Sometimes for optimization log is flushed at intervals

member.name: T:CSHARP.Diagnostics.MemoryEventLog
member.summary: Supports storing event log messages in memory

member.summary: Connection String not applicable for memory event log

member.name: P:CSHARP.Diagnostics.MemoryEventLog.Parameters
member.summary: Parameters not applicable for memory event log

member.name: P:CSHARP.Diagnostics.MemoryEventLog.VerboseLevel
member.summary: Verbose used to filter messages written to log

member.name: M:CSHARP.Diagnostics.MemoryEventLog.FlushEventLog
member.summary: Flush log not applicable to Memory event log

member.name: M:CSHARP.Diagnostics.MemoryEventLog.ToString
member.summary: Returns the current contents of the event log as a string
